item.title: Light pollution from big TV screen Merchant Sq, 28th October
item.description:
The light from the outside TV on the green in Merchant Square is causing coloured lights to be constantly coming into my living space. This TV is left on 24 hours a day, I’m not sure if someone is meant to switch it off and the end of the day or not? It’s severely affecting my sleep and there is no darkness. If this can be investigated and resolved I’d be very grateful. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Merchant Square, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leave removal sweeping, 28th October
item.description:
Severe leaf infestation between 104 to 100 dunstans road, please remove leaves as school children who attend Goodrich School have been slipping and falling over. The problem has persisted for 5 weeks now
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 110, Dunstan's Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Reflector Broken, 28th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Way, Poverest, London

item.title: Tree outside number 48 Wellington Avenue N9, 27th October
item.description:
This tree has not flowered again this year it does look like it is dying, but there has been some movement in the recent windy weather at the bottom and us residents are worried it will fall over the next time we have really windy weather.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Avenue, London
Report on FixMyStreet
